evidence.claim: Alleviate.care uses AWS services for its cloud infrastructure including Lambda and S3.
The platform is HIPAA compliant, ensuring the secure handling of protected health information.
Alleviate.care supports OAuth2 for secure API authentication.
The application utilizes FHIR standards for health data interoperability.

icp.icp_reason: Alleviate.care supports X12 transactions and values API automation for healthcare data exchange.
